author: John Tobin
comment: Very nice option for Moto 260 Sport. Love the ticks (aka indices) options, I use 4. Would like to see day and date but know this is available on the 2.0 version if Motorola ever gets their act together and release AW2 on the Sport.

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content:
There are lots and lots of additional options available on the 2.0 version, it's too much work to port that to the 1.0 version considering that most watches do get the update.

Let's hope that Motorola updates the 360 Sport soon!

author: james
comment: Only slight grumble is for the configuration to be done from the wear app, only to preview what the face will look like

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Currently working on a mobile configuration app and a lot more. The next update will also include a additional digital watchface and optional widgets. If you have any features in mind feel free to contact me on my email.

title: Nice, clean n minimal

author: Jorge Wiegand
comment: One of the best watchface for Android Wear! And the dev is very dedicated! Little request: can you make an option to NOT display cards info on ambient mode?

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: I'll look into it. Currently working on a very big update that includes widgets and a additional digital watch face.

title: Fantastic watch face!

author: Lewys Cousins
comment: Looks really nice! I often find myself coming back to this face. It also offers amazing customisation, you can change the way everything looks, the colour ect. Very nice job, love it, one of my favourite watch faces 10/10 :D
title: Beautiful Watch Face!!

author: Jurriaan Den Toonder
comment: I enjoy the nice design of this watch. It's easily customisable and works great!
title: Good looking watch!

author: Pete Gilbert
comment: Looking forward to seeing the updates and widgets. The "Fruit" company do indeed make some nice watch faces, so additional functional elements would be great
title: Very nice

author: Nicholas Carvalho
comment: Looks good I tried forever to find this. Could you fix the Moto 360 so it takes up the whole screen? 5 stars when that's fixed

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Will add a option to toggle full use of moto 360 screen in next version.

title: Good so far

author: Steve Giles
comment: A calendar ring would make it the ultimate watch face!

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Calendar ring will be added on next update.

title: Perfect!

author: Shai Pal
comment: All the best cloning all others!
title: Yay for Apple watch classic clone

author: Cameron Kilgore
comment: Definitely doesn't fall too far from the apple tree 😉
title: Well designed

author: Daniel Marcinkowski
comment: Do you remember me from reddit? WMR2 here! Thank you a lot! 😊
title: Love it!

author: E zam
comment: Why  my  smart  watch  cannot  use  this  face..  my  watch  kingwear kw18

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: It's an Android Wear watch face as clearly stated in the description, I do not intend to support cheap watches from china now or in the future.

author: Elias Asmar
comment: Moto 360 please stretch out face more to outside

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: I'll add a option for that in the next update, see my email reply for more details.

title: Cool

author: Pamela Dobson
comment: Nice, simple face that looks great on my Zenwatch 3

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: Please check the new version for Android Wear 2.0 on the Zen Watch 3 that was recently updated :D

author: Mikko Käyhkö
comment: Could you add the option of no ticks?

reply.author: Seahorsepip
reply.content: I'll have it added in the next update.

title: Very cool
